org.daisy.pipeline.job

Class ZippedJobResources

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.daisy.pipeline.job.ZippedJobResources
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JobResources

    public final class ZippedJobResources
extends Object
implements JobResources
    The Class ZipResourceContext wrapps a zip file into a resource collection, it is used as context to execute pipelines.
